comment: During lecture portion, she reads directly from slides. During lab portion,she stands at her computer while the TAs do all the teaching to everyone because they didn't learn from the lecture. 30+day turnaround for anything to be graded/No feedback on assignments. Tests handwritten. If you want to learn to code/CS major,DON'T take this professor.

Syllabus/1st assignment posted 2 weeks into the semester. No guidance or instruction was provided. We were assigned 3 text books, with no guidance as to what to read and when. Over 1/2 of assignments, quizzes, & exams were not graded until 2 week from the end of the semester. Disregards student communication and feedback. Makes tech excuses.
pretty good teacher in my opinion just pay attention
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Gives good feedback--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: If you want to learn to code, do not take this teacher. She literally reads off a slide for 20 minutes, then tells you to begin writing programs for the rest of the class. My book has been my best friend, and i'm basically teaching myself from Google. The teachers assistants are so busy answering everyones questions that you're lucky to get help.
